mapper.insert: insert into sb_user_role(role_id, user_id, created_by, updated_by, valid) VALUES (#{sysRole.id}, #{sysUser.id}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, 1)
mapper.select: select sr.SR_SOURCE srSource from sb_user_role sur left join sys_role sr on sur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID left join sys_user su on sur.USER_ID = su.ID where sr.Valid = 1 and su.Valid = 1 and sur.Valid = 1 and su.ID = #{id}

SELECT u.REAL_NAME realName, rl.workId, rl.srNames FROM sys_user u, ( SELECT u.WORKID workId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.SR_NAME SEPARATOR ',') AS srNames FROM sb_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.ID = sur.USER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.ID = sur.ROLE_ID WHERE sur.Valid = 1 AND u.Valid = 1 AND r.Valid = 1 GROUP BY workId ) rl WHERE u.Valid = 1 AND u.WORKID = rl.workId

select sr.ID id from sb_user_role sur left join sys_role sr on sur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID left join sys_user su on sur.USER_ID = su.ID where sur.Valid = 1 and sr.Valid = 1 and su.Valid = 1 and su.ID = #{userId}
